patthana17.18:1.1: Kusalaṃ atītārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naatītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
patthana17.18:2.1: Kusalaṃ anāgatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naanāgatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
patthana17.18:3.1: Kusalaṃ paccuppannārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo napaccuppannārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
